article:
I was on my way home to Cincinnati from a business trip to New York,one day later than planned.My wife was admitted to   _  that afternoon for surgery,and I was      _  about getting back as soon as possible.
    When I   _   at the ticket counter to board the flight,the agent   _   me that I would be responsible for my own luggage when I  _   planes at Kennedy Airport.I had a  _   ,a briefcase with books and a case of equipment    _    for my job as an engineer."What about the entire luggage?" I   _   ,''I'll have only a few minutes to make my connecting   _   .''"The airport bus won't be far away,''she said.
    I   _   the plane and while it ran on the runway I figured anxiously.Finally I bowed  my   _   and prayed,"Lord,please help me make my connecting flight.My wife is   counting on    me."I took a deep breath and tried to relax during the 45-minute trip.
    Upon   _  ,I saw the airport bus in the distance and struggled with my luggage.I  can't  _   that plane!
    "Sir,"som eone said behind me,"it looks like you need   _   .''A skycap !"We'll get you right on the bus,''he said,   _  his dolly with my luggage.He  rolled it along while I walked    _    beside him.
    As he put my luggage in the airport bus.   _  for my wallet to tip him and thank  him.But when I   looked up  ,he was gone."What happened to that skycap?',I asked the official next to me. "Skycap?", he said,looking  _  .''The man who helped you is the  director of the airport.''
